sentences.en: He went into the hospital to undergo tests for a pain in his abdomen.
sentences.cn: 他去了医院接受对他的腹部疼痛进行的各项检查。

sentences.en: Spiders usually have silk glands under their abdomen.
sentences.cn: 蜘蛛通常在腹部下有丝腺。

sentences.en: Scans of his chest, abdomen, and pelvis likewise showed nothing.
sentences.cn: 扫描他的胸部、腹部和骨盆也没有什么发现。
